benchmark_details.name: MultiSocial
benchmark_details.overview: MultiSocial is the first multilingual (22 languages) and multi-platform (5 social media platforms) dataset for benchmarking machine-generated text detection in the social-media domain, containing 472,097 texts including human-written and machine-generated instances.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark dataset for machine-generated text detection methods on social-media texts.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset primarily consists of texts from five social-media platforms and is limited to 7 text generators.

data.source: The dataset contains human-written data from five different social-media platforms (Telegram, Twitter, Gab, Discord, and WhatsApp) combined with machine-generated texts from 7 SOTA LLMs.
data.annotation: Annotated with human and machine-generated text labels.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated using models trained on the MultiSocial dataset.
methodology.interpretation: Higher AUC ROC indicates better detection capability.
methodology.validation: Each method is validated on separate subsets of the dataset.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The dataset is anonymized and does not contain sensitive user data.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Published in accordance with the licenses of the six existing datasets it is based on.
